name: Solitaire Pro!
description:
Simply the best Solitaire experience for your iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.

If you love windows Solitaire but want something with a little more class, this is the app for you!

- The best looking Solitaire app on the store.
- AD FREE
- 40 beautiful themes with more to come.
- Draw one or draw three gameplay.
- Drag & drop, tap to move, or automove controls.
- Landscape and portrait orientation.
- Left or right handed play.
- Free updates including more theme packs.
- Slick interface and animations.
- Statistics tracking.
